content.detailedDescription: i was looking up, watching my grandson climb up myradio tower by my house.  i saw a shinney object traveling at great speeddirectly overhead headed west into the sunset. i though at first it was aweather baloon but the air at groud level was calm.  i seemed to be dragingsomething attached to the rear or it was fliping something back and forth on therear.  it looked like maybe it was up about 15,000 to 20,000 ft.  four or fivetimes faster than the jets that were on path to dfw.  may be one of the pilotssaw same. i couldnt see it when i went around the house the sun was in my eyes.
content.summary: Ufo shiney, fast, trailing or wiggeling part behin

content.detailedDescription: (evidently responding to the six questions in the personal account section) 1)on spalding road riding around. 2) we seen the strange lights. 3) i guess ithought it was a ufo. 4) the car went dead. i watched the lights and franklooked at the car. 5) just stayed at the same place. 6) they just disappearedand the cars power came back soon as they went.
content.summary: Two glowing orange balls sighted

content.detailedDescription: "was atplace of employment working oputside of plant when a thunder storm arised.Waited until storm was over and sun came out. went outside to work and a darkobject caught my eye. i thought object was a ballon at first. it appeared torise straight up and then take a westerly (?)direction. as i watched the ufo istarted feeling as if i was being watched. i had heard that ufos can makecontact with esp so i focused my thoughts and at that time the object tilted toreveal the hat shape. my thoughts were that if it was a ufo to let me know insome way. when ufo was overhead i went back into plant and out the east side ofbuilding to continue watching but could not spot it after that. the ufo movedslowly and very smoothly.
content.summary: Slow moving, hat-shaped ufo sighted

content.detailedDescription: we were playing the twelth hole at fanconia golfcoarse when a jet airliner brought attention to a tan colored cigar shaped craftover the golf coarse. as the plane flew under the craft my perception was thatthe craft was nowhere near the airplane. the craft seemed to tip sideways andonce forward to reveal a saucer shape. we all questioned what we were seeing andagreed that the craft was very far away and must have been very large. it justdid not belong there. it was not a ballon or aircraft or planet. there wasnothing in the sky other than the quick passing of the plane to compare it tobut we had plenty of time to study it and found it very puzzleing. we all havemuch better things to do with our time than look for objects in the sky but thisjust dint fit. maybe someone else saw it or maybe the pilot or passangers sawsomething but there it was, whatever plane as day.
content.summary: Craft over golf coarse
Bright light moving toward sw over marrowstone isl

content.detailedDescription: i was waiting to unload my truck.Watching c-130sgo over and noticed something way up in sky it made 2 circles in sky andstraight up behind the clouds.
content.summary: Like a small jet it made to circles in sky and wen
Cigar over phx. az.

content.detailedDescription: Legacy case entered by mufon of oh. a young mother was driving with her two sons and grandmother on cranes run roadwhere it dead-ends into sr25 in rural southern montgomery co., oh nearmiamisburg in aug. or sept. of 1966 at 7:30 or 8:00 p.M. they stopped at a stopsign and looked across the field where the un was going down (w) and saw asaucer-shaped object in fron of the sun, approximately 1/2 mi. away. the objectwas bright, shiny and looked like it might be touching down on the ground orvery close to the ground. it was about the size of a truck."we heard a humming sound, quite distinct.... i couldnt tell a distinct colorbecause the sun was behint it, but it shimmered a lot and wavered. no wind wasblowing the ground, dirt, or grass. it had a clockwise right-to-left spin."the four occupants of the car watched it about 10 minutes. other traffic pulledover (3 or 4 cars) and their occupants also saw the object.  soon the objectbegan to ascend."it tilted back and took off slow....I lost sight of it in the distance. theobject was pretty looking but it still gave me goose bumps."
content.summary: Humming, spinning saucer near ground in rural oh

content.detailedDescription: Legacy report entered by mufon of oh. on sat, 10/21/78, at 3 p.M., a 40-year-old man -- who had a private pilotslicense -- was working in his front yard in a suburban subdivision incenterville, oh when he noticed some vapor trails across the sky. it was a clearfall day with one high layer of cirrus clouds estimated at 40,000 ft. out of thecorner of his eye he saw a tiny ball, shiny like chrome, coming from the n atabout 35,000 ft. "then the object turned a flew above and on the other side ofthe vapor trail.... as it flew along east, it turned color to a flat white. thenit stopped and turned gray and all this time i was yelling for my wife to bringme the binoculars."he did not locate the object through the binoculars, but re-established visualcontact. when the object stopped, "it turned more of a flat gray color.  ithovered there for...A minute....Then it just took off right straight up and itwent right through this high layer of cirrus clouds...And then it was gone."when asked if the vapor trails looked fresh, the witness stated that as a pilothe could tell the difference between fresh and old vapor trails. "the vaportrails werent new...They were getting puffy. they were up there real high aboutthe size of a dc-9 or a lear jet. on my sighting a helicopter cant do what isaw and a seather balloon cant do what i saw and an airplane cant do it." thewitness stated there was no vapor trail from the object and no sound from it.
content.summary: Pilot saw sphere change color/direction, hover, as

content.detailedDescription: Legacy case entered by mufon of oh. it was a clear evening in colerain township (hamilton county), suburbancincinnati, oh, in aug 1977. a 16-year-old male was sitting on the front porchof his house, daydreaming and watching the night sky. the temperature wasbetween 60 and 70 degrees with little wind. at about 10:00 p.M. the witnessfirst noticed an object that he thought may have been a meteorite.  "i was caland continued watching....The object was shaped like a baseball, bright orangeand didnt leave a trail. there was no noise discernible. the object appearedsolid, blowed and made a few abrupt turns. thats when i knew it wasnt ameteorite."as he watched, the object moved from n to e, then n again and then beganascending. the object disappeared as it went straight up. viewing time wasapproximately 15 seconds. the witness continued to watch for the object forabout an hour, but didnt see it.
content.summary: Glowing orange sphere made abrupt turns and ascend
3 orange semispheres in the sky

content.detailedDescription: mother and daughter saw a bright light over a swimming pool which was located inthe back yard of a home. a light came out of the bottom of the object. theywatched the object for one minute. silver in color. no openings or doors. nomore than 100 feet above the pool. the light reflected from the pool onto anearby house. after a minute it tilted sideways, rose slowly to above the trees,which "swished back and forth. then suddenly, boom, and it was gone quick."size: 3/4s of the size of a ranch house. no sound. the witnesses searched for itfor 15 minutes.
content.summary: Bright silver object over a swimming pool. trees s
About  7 years ago i saw a ufo hovering over a hou

content.detailedDescription: We werecoming out of the library on germantown pike by the back door.  looking south icalled to penny, do you see that. it was dusk and the sky was clear. about fiftyfeet in the air and about a 1/4 mile away was a hugh cigar shaped object justhovering without making a sound. in fact there were no sounds from the entireneighborhood. i noticed red, blue and green lights which flashed in a pattern. we were very scared.  the two girls started walking slowly toward the object aspenny was very curious.  demi warned penny not to go toward it.  the object thenbegan a slow slant type of ascent and then it took off real fast and zoomedaway.  direction of departure was from the south to southwest.  we observed italtogether about four minutes.  it was a large object about two semi-trucks insize.  the two girls sat in their automobile for quite a while and thentelephoned whio-tv channel 7.  the television station advised demi that manysightings were reported to the station that day.  some sightings were mentionedon the television news show that night.
content.summary: Dayton ufo sighting, 1971 or 72

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home after work and i saw a light inthe se sky completely still.I knew it was not a tower. it stayed there as iapproached it. i turned east onto the bigger highwayand was directly beneath it.(route 32) i have a sunroof in the car and it was open. as soon as i wasdirectly under it and looking up,it turned its light out.Tha t is all i have toreport. it was probably nothing but i thought you should know. i have never hadany other sightings in my life.
content.summary: A still brilliant light overhead on the highway

content.detailedDescription: brightlight came from right to left(east to west) horizon to horizon in less than fiveseconds. then made a ninety degree turn to the south and stopped behind a puffycumulus cloud( one of two small cumulus clouds on the left of the vehicle.)  itthen jumped behind the other cumulus cloud for a few seconds.  i saw enough ofthe object to see the curvature of the white light, but not the entire object. it was sort of arrowhead shaped.  witness works for defense electronic supplycenter in dayton,oh and is familiar with aircraft. the maneuvers of this objectand speed were not a conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Wickenberg, az sighting, august, 1967

content.detailedDescription: i owned a horse ranch in oregon. (1) this personcame to the ranch, and a very interesting event happened over a period of threedays. secondly in calif.A very interesting object appeared every night atapprox. 9:30 with some very interesting routines (all the same) for a period ofweeks.  i have never written this down as it is best told in person as to me itis unbelievable. no i was not sucked up or anything so flambouyant, but a veryunusual occurance happened twice! not to long ago i was watching  show on tvabout ufos and throughout the program i felt like  had a lot to contribute inthe way of information to some of the questions they were asking. this info. canonly be given in person. if you are interested i thank you, if not i can keep asecret.
content.summary: 2 incidents. one in oregon 1964 and 2 in oakdale c

content.detailedDescription: 1st jan 2001.0025hrs. i took a break from studyingand went outside to see if i could see the fireworks across the bay. sighted anobject (orange ball of light) ,thought it was a skyrocket at first, size approx1/2 size of little fingernail at arms lenght. realised almost too late- objecttravelling very fast , under 5000ft(approx)and was not a conventional aircraft.Ran inside ,retrieved video,object now many kilometers away and still silent. focused on ball of light, used zoom, saw two clusters of lights with largeblank/black space between.Some
content.summary: Ufo sighted 00.25 hrs 1st jan 2001duration 2mins h
A possible sighting

content.detailedDescription: 1/ iwas looking out at stars as often did at niteas small child when i woke up in middle of nite to use bathroom.2/ it came rightover the house..Between ours and nieghbors...Right over treetops. no sound.3/.Ithought was loveliest thing i ever saw.Was bigger than the house.4/ i watched itas it banked and went up towards other side of house and out of my view. i laymy face on the glass to see it as long as i could.I loved fact it was so quiet3b i then went back to sleep...Kids arent frightened...At least i wasnt.5/ itwas silvery, metalic colored. disc shaped, with lights around the edge...Iremember them as blue and green, about 18 to 24 inches apart. they did notblink. when it banked i saw a dome on top that seemed to be frosted glass, icould see dim light within.The thing i remember the most, (and have never foundduplicated in reports i have seen/read) was out what appeared to be theback...It could have been backing up for all i know...Were redstreaks/beams/rods(???).They were bright red and when it banked they went withit without any drag that i can remember. they came out a certain distance andend of them corraliated with edge of disk...They did not appear to beflames...More like light rods.8/it simply went out of my viewing range ,. p.S.Please note...Some of above answers in survey above  relate to things yearslater than this incident...I am just not sure that they are not related.
content.summary: i saw a  large, and lovely disk right above my ho
Black l shaped object

content.detailedDescription: We just walked outside. i looked up to see what i thought were ducks. it wasflying over in formation, five or six triangles. they went in a straight lineand were going pretty fast. absolutly no noise and no lights. we only saw themfor about 5 seconds. lost sight of them when they went behind a tree.
content.summary: Triangle shapes moving in formation.

content.detailedDescription: In late march or early april, 1997, (witness simply knows that hale-bopp cometwas in the nnw that night) witness on his way home from church about 9:00 p.M.Was headed north on 86th street just north of i-80 in the des moines-johnston,iowa area, when he noticed a car pulled over with a young couple standing in thecold without coats on, looking up.  witness assumed couple watching hale-boppcomet, and so he hunched forward to look through his own windshield and viewedhale-bopp nnw of him for a few seconds at estimated 25 degrees west of north. then settling back in car seat, casually glanced to his left (w) throughdrivers window and saw the ufo at about 75-80 degrees up from horizon.  witnessstopped his car and watched (by this time he was 8/10 mile north of i-80.Witness estimates that for about 5 seconds he could see some dark structure, butwhat really impressed him was his view of huge rectangular bright white lightpanels (estimates 6-8 panels) which looked to be on the side or end of theobject. in addition to the light panels, he observed a centrally located pulsingwhite light on what he thinks might have been the underside of object.  witnessheard no sound from this huge object which seemed to fill a large portion of hisfield of vision (when interviewed at the site by two mufon investigators,witness pointed to a nearby low-hanging cloud to indicate size of ufo....Becausecloud witness pointed to was hanging above both commercial and residentialdevelopment, and investigator was able to measure the distance he pointed out, aconservative estimate might be in the 800-1,000 foot range in size.)  witnessaltitude estimate was 2-3000 feet at land distance of less than 3/4 mile.Witness perception is that object either turned all white, or that the objectitself turned to a side where it was lighted all white, and then elevateddrastically in altitude after about 5 seconds and sped away very fast to the w,with the total sighting no more than 40-45 seconds in duration.Witness quickly did a u-turn and headed back south, hoping to find the youngcouple hed seen by the side of the road, but they were already driving awayfrom the area.  witness believes that the young couple, judging from theirstance and where they were looking into the sky, were watching the object as itmoved from east to west over his vehicle before he caught sight of it himself.Witness called urbandale police department, but was told they had received nocalls about the incident.It should be noted that witness does not want his identity known publicly, so itwould seem that he sees nothing to gain in finally reporting this incident. [note:  the trigger for his decision to finally hunt on the internet for anorganization to which he could report this incident, was the documentary airedin march, 2001 outlining the jan.2000 southern illinois case involving policemenand civilians in various locations.]
content.summary: 1997, 800-1000ft,w/in 3/4 mile, 6-8rectangular lig

content.detailedDescription: The principal witness was walking for exercise between 5:00 am and 6:00 am.  shesawa brightly glowing sphere about three times the size of the planet venus.  shestopped a neighbor who was backing out her car to go to work, asking her to look at thestrange bright light.  the neighbor looked briefly at the direction to which thewitness was pointing and then continued on to work.  the first witness watchedthe ball of light for about seven minutes at which time she lost sight of it.
content.summary: Bright light miami, 4.10.01

content.detailedDescription: We were standing at our car in a parkinglot. when person #1 said what is that in the sky? we all looked to see atriangular shaped object glide overhead. it was not moving very fast, it seemedto be in no great hurry. it had 5 lights on its underside along each wing. theobject was very big and very high. it flew above the sirus clouds. it was flyingfrom north to south and as we quietly watched it fly overus it then passedbehind a tree and into a cloud. we walked out further into the lot to watch itemerge from the cloud on the other side and it never did. it just disappeared. ithought maybe it was the stealth but it was shaped like a perfect triangle andit did not make a sound. no engine sound or anything. i am nothing other thanamazed and i am wondering what exactly did i see. was it a ufo or just thegovernment at work????
content.summary: Gliding object dark triagular shaped

content.detailedDescription: i was looking at clouds blowing through the sky. suddenly i saw two round objects that seemed to be moving to slow for aircraft. however, their possitions would change relitave to one another very quickly. icalled my son to come watch and he varified my sitings.  we then called thecolumbus miss. air force bace and talked with flight opps.  they said that theydid have flights in the area.  at one time my son and my neighbors saw severalseperate objects.  only after we contacted the air forcem we saw thourghbinoculars that the objects appeared to be baloons.  the strange thing is thatbefore we verified the baloons, the objects that we had seen, moved in erradicmotions and changed positions relitive to one another, to such a degree and sofast that i cant believe that is was wind currents simply moving bolloons.
content.summary: We think that we saw ufos
Green ball of light just below artturus star

content.detailedDescription: after shopping at publix witness and son spotted a light similar to lights theyhad seen two nights before (feb. 7th, 2000 - see #1-266) and video taped.  itappeared to be at same location. witness attempted to drive in direction of thelight to discover source, traveling eastward approx. two miles.  the lighthovered in one position for about 15-20 minutes.  it seemed as though they werecloser.  it appeared to be a white light with an orange glow around it.  anotherlight appeared near it for 3 min. and then disappeared, then the first lightdisappeared, never to be seen again.
content.summary: Orange glowing light witnessed again

content.detailedDescription: The object glided directly overhead, it wastriangular in shape. it had lights along the perimiter underneath. it seemed tofly a straight course. it made no sound, which led us to believe it was not aplane. it was pretty high up, above sirus clouds, and it was large. close up itmust have been huge. it wasnt moving very fast, just kinda gliding. first itflew diectly overhead, we actually watched it as it approached. we were in aparking lot as it flew by, and it then flew behind some trees, went above theclouds and disappeared. we waited for it to come out of the clouds but it neverdid.
content.summary: Large triangular in shape with 5 to 7 lights on th

content.detailedDescription: i am an amerature astronomer and was star gazing ~1.5-2.0 hrs post sunset.  i noticed in the 6x30 viewfinder a couple moving stars.  i tracked them and looked through the primary telescope (maksutov newtonian 10inch f5.5 if=1400mm, with televue panopic 22mm eyepiece).  the view thought the telescope revealed three "stars" in an elongated triangular formation moving at a constant speed.  the "stars" maintained a perfectly arranged triangle throughout their transit.  i estimated based on the eyepiece field of view to be between .2 and .3 degrees apart (the full moon is .5 degrees across). i tracked the objects for ~40seconds across aprox 20degrees of sky towards the south east, when they all became dimmer faded away in a couple seconds.  the brightness of all three was approximatly 7.0, and not visible with the unaided eye.  there was unobstructed view of stars and sky between the three objects at all times. i quickly went in side to check nasas j-pass satellite tracking system too seeif any satellites matched this description.  it was the correct time of nightfor satellites to be lit by the sun, but no three satellites could be found thatwere on exactly the same path, at the same time, and the same location.  i haveseen satellites before which moved in a similar straight line, at a similarspeed, but never multiple satellites perfectly matched for brightness, directionspeed and time of night.  if would be a tremendous coincidence for threesatellites to match this set of circumstances.
content.summary: Three satellite objects flying formation through t
